projects.name: Field Service Management (FSM) web portal and MAUI app for Android and iOS

responsibilities: Design, develop features and perform optimizations for FSM web site using ASP.NET MVC framework.
Analyze and implement detailed design specifications, provide feedback, and independently perform the work required from the design.
Analyze requirements and clarify scope of work tasks with Business Analysts and Product Managers.
Communicate with quality assurance to validate work delivered and work quality.
Review code and pull requests from other developers.
Perform accessibility and code optimizations based on evaluations to maintain web vitals.
Utilize Azure services for cloud-based application deployment, scaling, and monitoring.
Develop UI and implement features FSM MAUI mobile app for Android and iOS.

projects.name: Consumer sites for Bell Canada and Lucky Mobile, Internal CMS Web portal for Bell Canada

responsibilities: Design and develop features in front end - pages, components and widgets using React,AngularJS, CSHTML and jQuery based on mockups.
Develop and optimize back-end services, web APIs and microservices using OpenAPI and ASP.NET Web API.
Scaling web services and enhancing performance and security of APIs.
Analyzing business requirements and proactively providing ideas to improve proposed solutions.
Ensure code quality through unit testing and automated functional testing in an agile environment.
Drive architecture and execute Bell technical strategy.
Project management using Salesforce CMS and Jira.
Consult with clients and other technology groups on issues, recommend advanced programming solutions and actively propose improvements.
Troubleshoot and debug production issues and provide timely resolutions.
Developing and refining CI/CD pipelines, participating in deployment and release activities.

projects.name: WARS - Data warehouse, data migration and Business Intelligence for Allianz Insurance
Shopify ecommerce site - Customize site to suite brand and add functionality using add-ons.

responsibilities: Develop, implement new features and maintain existing programs in both front-end using React and Angular.
Develop back-end services using Node.js, C#, ASP.NET Core SQL Server queries and stored procedures.
Work on REST APIs and microservices, securing and optimizing them.
Run DevOps operations like managing Azure boards, setting up repos and pipelines for build in Azure DevOps.
Design MS SQL tables, queries, stored procedures and optimize queries for better performance and efficiency.
Managed and supported the team of software engineering staff by organizing functional and technical sessions to ramp up the team skills.
Contributed to business development by identifying opportunities and working on tender preparation.
Engage with stakeholders to gather requirements, delegate tasks, manage team and provide updates to client.
Design architecture, develop features (entire ASP.NET core MVC website and SQL database) and hosting in Azure (Azure app service, Blobs and Azure SQL).
Create responsive websites for clients based on the requirements and work on Bizinfe website.
Design UI/UX mockups and wireframes, develop front end pages and components.
Work on API development, database design, writing queries and stored procedures.
Write scripts using Perl and Shell to automate tasks.
Code optimization, testing, integration and performance analysis.
